user.title: Add a Haptique Extender
user.description:
Enter the IP address and authentication token for your Haptique Extender device.

**How to get your token:**
1. Open the Haptique Extender app on your smartphone
2. Connect to your device
3. The token will be automatically copied to your clipboard
